name: Middle/Senior QA Engineer
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Both Front-end and Back-end testing

  • Create test plans from Requirements and Design Documents

  • Maintain test plans

  • Test Defect Fixes

  • Execute manual test scripts according to proces

  • Record test results

  • Identify, reproduce, and report defects

Education, Experience, Skills:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline
  • 3+ years of hands-on testing experience to include:
  • Ability to develop and implement test plans and test cases
  • A strong working knowledge of testing client/server applications
  • Excellent understanding of QA theory
  • Experience with bug tracking to resolution and software development support
  • Expert knowledge of PC’s and Operating Systems across multiple Windows/Linux environments
  • Ability to effectively work in a team environment while being self-directed and highly motivated
  • Follow set processes and procedures
  • Excellent memory and communication skills
  • Ability to clearly and concisely articulate problems and explain exactly how to reproduce them.
  • Good problem solving and analytical skills.
  • Interpersonal and organizational skills
  • Extreme attention to detail
  • Ability to meet deadlines and overcome challenges

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Futures/ Commodities/Stock Market Knowledge, trading experience very helpful
  • Understanding of programming and OO concepts, client/server architecture

Working Conditions:

  • Job location: Samara, A. Tolstoy street, 92
  • Office hours: 11:00 – 20:00

Benefits:

  • CQG provides a variety of benefits to enhance your personal and financial well-being. Employees and eligible dependents may participate in the following:
  • Corporate banking services and possibility to obtain a loan with low interest rate;
  • Full medical insurance for employee and family;
  • Free lunch in the office;
  • Fare;
  • Free English classes (2 times a week during working hours);
  • Democratic, creative atmosphere in the team!

Salary will be discussed during an interview and be assigned according to the candidate's expectations and candidate's skills and experience.
